definition: each sticks to his own view (idiom); a dialogue of the deaf
self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: So, when it comes to our own pursuits of happiness, we agree to disagree.
sentences.chinese: 所以，在追求快樂方面，我們同意各執己見。

sentences.english: In the past few years, the two sides had argued and fought over their opinions.
sentences.chinese: 在過去幾年裏，雙方都各執己見，並大打出手。
